name: Silicon tetrachloride
desc: Silicon tetrachloride or tetrachlorosilane is the inorganic compound with the formula SiCl4. It is a colourless volatile liquid that fumes in air. It is used to produce high purity silicon and silica for commercial applications.
Solubility: soluble in benzene, toluene, chloroform, ether, hydrochloric acid
